fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Reveal yourself during the day by saying *“Feel the power of ANTICS”* (ping the host if needed)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you are revealed, you gain 4 extra votes and Overprotective Defense during the day.
- If you hang a Town Power, all townies are hit with a Powerful attack when the next night ends.
- Once you complete your goal, you will leave the town.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Reveal yourself and hang a townie (or good-aligned member).
